int16 width

Sprite width

Range: 0-512 (0: auto; use total width of the sprite)

x
float x

Horizontal position on the screen.

<0, 1.0> = left to right

(-1.0, 0) = right to left

-1.0 = centered

y
float y

Vertical position on the screen.

<0, 1.0> = top to bottom

(-1.0, 0) = bottom to top

-1.0 = centered
